visitorMessage: Any take away you want, in one place
welcomeMessage: Thanks for sign in to our website! You are now able to search take aways, view and score your orders, manage your wallet, update your profile and more. Also you can create your own service and start selling your take aways!
rateOrders.subtitle: You have {count, plural, =0 {no orders to rate. Perfect!} one {# order to rate. Remember if you have unrated orders, you can't buy takeouts!} other {# orders to rate. Remember if you have unrated orders, you can't buy takeouts!}}
string.min: Field must be at least {n} characters long
string.max: Field must be more than {n} characters long
invalidFormat: Field is not in a valid format
client.create.description: There is only one step remaining, complete your profile and you are ready to go.
serviceMessage: Your service has been successfully created! Now you can create your own take aways.
location.verified: The location has been successfully verified!
service.deliveryDistance: Maximum distance to make a delivery in Kms*
name: Name
offerDisclaimer: Must be a minimum of two offers per take away. Maximum value of a take away is $1000. First offer has a minimum amount of orders between 10 and 70 to apply the new price, the second one, between 40 and 150 and the following ones starting from 100. An offer must have a price lower and a minimum amount higher than the previous one.
max20ValidMenus: You have reached the maximum amount of 20 valid take aways, impossible to create a new one
cookingTime: Average time to prepare the take away (in minutes)*
successRatingOrder: You successfully rated {n, plural, one {star} other {# stars}} to order with take out {takeout}
